column4: does any one know how to get quicktime (.mov) to work? or is it even possible? (ps. java is running now)
i did. nothing showed up... i searched "quicktime' and 'quick time'.
https://wiki.ubuntulinux.org/RestrictedFormats says that mplayer and xine can play QuickTime using built-in codecs
i think they are refering to .avi not .mov
